rc7586MIB.name: rc7586MIB

revisions.description: 1.0 Initial version of this MIB module.

rc7586MIB.contactinfo: Magda Raltcheva Postal: Codan Limited 81 Graves St. Newton 5074 Australia Tel: +61-8-83050311 Fax: +61-8-83050411 Web: www.codan.com.au
rc7586MIB.description: The Structure of Management Information for the Codan enterprise. Copyright(c) 2009 All rights reserved

ComponentRevision.name: ComponentRevision
ComponentRevision.description: The hex value in the first octet - xx - represents the major revision no. and the hex value in the second octet - yy - represents the minor revision no.

FaultStatus7586.name: FaultStatus7586
FaultStatus7586.description: Describes all the possible faults in the system as a bit pattern.

operationalMode.name: operationalMode
operationalMode.description: Sets 7586 operational mode - Auto, Manual Stream1, Stream2.

waveguideSwitch.name: waveguideSwitch
waveguideSwitch.description: Sets Waveguide switch Rx+Tx, Rx/Tx and Tx Only.

idInfo.name: idInfo
idInfo.description: Gets the module firmware revision, serial number and model. This string will have a zero length if the revision is unknown.

buc1TxOn.name: buc1TxOn
buc1TxOn.description: Sets Tx on/off. Respond -1 if buc1 not connected.

buc2TxOn.name: buc2TxOn
buc2TxOn.description: Sets Tx on/off. Respond -1 if buc2 not connected.

buc1TxDefault.name: buc1TxDefault
buc1TxDefault.description: Sets Tx default 1-last 0-off. Respond -1 if buc1 not connected.

buc2TxDefault.name: buc2TxDefault
buc2TxDefault.description: Sets Tx default 1-last 0-off. Respond -1 if buc2 not connected.

buc1TxAttenuator.name: buc1TxAttenuator
buc1TxAttenuator.description: Sets/Gets Tx attenuation value in 1dBm steps. Respond -1 if buc1 not connected.

buc2TxAttenuator.name: buc2TxAttenuator
buc2TxAttenuator.description: Sets/Gets Tx attenuation value in 1dBm steps. Respond -1 if buc2 not connected.

buc1Protocol.name: buc1Protocol
buc1Protocol.description: Sets/Gets packet protocol 0 - ASCII, 1 - CODAN, 2 - SAbus, 3 - Comstream, 4 - NDSatcom. Respond -1 if buc1 not connected.

buc2Protocol.name: buc2Protocol
buc2Protocol.description: Sets/Gets packet protocol 0 - ASCII, 1 - CODAN, 2 - SAbus, 3 - Comstream, 4 - NDSatcom. Respond -1 if buc2 not connected.

buc1Address.name: buc1Address
buc1Address.description: Sets/Gets packet address: 0-31 NDSatcom ...Respond -1 if buc1 not connected.

buc2Address.name: buc2Address
buc2Address.description: Sets/Gets packet address: 0-31 NDSatcom ...Respond -1 if buc2 not connected.

buc1Mode.name: buc1Mode
buc1Mode.description: Sets/Gets redundancy mode 0-none, 1-warm, 2-hot. Respond -1 if buc1 not connected.

buc2Mode.name: buc2Mode
buc2Mode.description: Sets/Gets redundancy mode 0-none, 1-warm, 2-hot. Respond -1 if buc2 not connected.

buc1OnLine.name: buc1OnLine
buc1OnLine.description: Sets/Gets redundancy mode on on/off line state. Respond -1 if buc1 not connected.

buc2OnLine.name: buc2OnLine
buc2OnLine.description: Sets/Gets redundancy mode on on/off line state. Respond -1 if buc2 not connected.

buc1RFFreq.name: buc1RFFreq
buc1RFFreq.description: Sets/Gets the RBUC RF frequency. Respond -1 if buc1 not connected.

buc2RFFreq.name: buc2RFFreq
buc2RFFreq.description: Sets/Gets the RBUC RF frequency. Respond -1 if buc2 not connected.

buc1IFFreq.name: buc1IFFreq
buc1IFFreq.description: Sets/Gets the RBUC IF frequency. Respond -1 if buc1 not connected.

buc2IFFreq.name: buc2IFFreq
buc2IFFreq.description: Sets/Gets the RBUC IF frequency. Respond -1 if buc2 not connected.

buc1LOFreq.name: buc1LOFreq
buc1LOFreq.description: Sets/Gets the RBUC LO frequency. Respond -1 if buc1 not connected.

buc2LOFreq.name: buc2LOFreq
buc2LOFreq.description: Sets/Gets the RBUC LO frequency. Respond -1 if buc2 not connected.

buc1SerIf.name: buc1SerIf
buc1SerIf.description: Sets/Gets serial interface - rate, length, parity, stop, terminate RS422/485. **** No respond - message if buc1 not connected.

buc2SerIf.name: buc2SerIf
buc2SerIf.description: Sets/Gets serial interface - rate, length, parity, stop, terminate RS422/485. **** No respond - message if buc2 not connected.

buc1PwrAlarmThresh.name: buc1PwrAlarmThresh
buc1PwrAlarmThresh.description: Sets/Gets power alarm threshold. **** No respond - message if buc1 not connected.

buc2PwrAlarmThresh.name: buc2PwrAlarmThresh
buc2PwrAlarmThresh.description: Sets/Gets power alarm threshold. **** No respond - message if buc2 not connected.

buc1BurstPwrThresh.name: buc1BurstPwrThresh
buc1BurstPwrThresh.description: Sets/Gets burst power threshold. **** No respond - message if buc1 not connected.

buc2BurstPwrThresh.name: buc2BurstPwrThresh
buc2BurstPwrThresh.description: Sets/Gets burst power threshold. **** No respond - message if buc2 not connected.

buc1RefSource.name: buc1RefSource
buc1RefSource.description: Sets/Gets reference source 0-external, 1-internal (Only for RBUC). **** No respond - message if buc1 not connected.

buc2RefSource.name: buc2RefSource
buc2RefSource.description: Sets/Gets reference source 0-external, 1-internal (Only for RBUC). **** No respond - message if buc2 not connected.

buc1LEDState.name: buc1LEDState
buc1LEDState.description: Sets/Gets LEDs status on/off (Only for RBUC). **** No respond - message if buc1 not connected.

buc2LEDState.name: buc2LEDState
buc2LEDState.description: Sets/Gets LEDs status on/off (Only for RBUC). **** No respond - message if buc2 not connected.

buc1PaStatus.name: buc1PaStatus
buc1PaStatus.description: Gets to 1 when PA is on. Respond -1 if buc1 not connected.

buc2PaStatus.name: buc2PaStatus
buc2PaStatus.description: Gets to 1 when PA is on. Respond -1 if buc2 not connected.

buc1TxPower.name: buc1TxPower
buc1TxPower.description: Gets Tx power format x.x dB. **** No respond - message if buc1 not connected.

buc2TxPower.name: buc2TxPower
buc2TxPower.description: Gets Tx power format x.x dB. **** No respond - message if buc2 not connected.

buc1TxBurstPower.name: buc1TxBurstPower
buc1TxBurstPower.description: Gets Tx power. Format is x.x,y.y,z.z, where x.x is current burst power, y.y is min and z.z is max burts power. **** No respond - message if buc1 not connected.

buc2TxBurstPower.name: buc2TxBurstPower
buc2TxBurstPower.description: Gets Tx power. Format is x.x,y.y,z.z, where x.x is current burst power, y.y is min and z.z is max burts power. **** No respond - message if buc2 not connected.

buc1Faults.name: buc1Faults
buc1Faults.description: Gets the current fault status. Format - Bit0 PA fault, Bit1 Fan fault, Bit2 Power fault, Bit3 Temp fault, Bit4 10MHz fault, Bit5 Internal fault Bit6 LNB fault, Bit7 Red'cy Cont fault. Respond -1 if buc2 not connected.

buc2Faults.name: buc2Faults
buc2Faults.description: Gets the current fault status. Format - Bit0 PA fault, Bit1 Fan fault, Bit2 Power fault, Bit3 Temp fault, Bit4 10MHz fault, Bit5 Internal fault Bit6 LNB fault, Bit7 Red'cy Cont fault. Respond -1 if buc2 not connected.

buc1LatchedFaults.name: buc1LatchedFaults
buc1LatchedFaults.description: Gets the current latched faults. Format is same as Faults. Respond -1 if buc2 not connected.

buc2LatchedFaults.name: buc2LatchedFaults
buc2LatchedFaults.description: Gets the current latched faults. Format is same as Faults. Respond -1 if buc2 not connected.

buc1Temperature.name: buc1Temperature
buc1Temperature.description: Gets the BUC temperature. Format is x.x. **** No respond - message if buc1 not connected.

buc2Temperature.name: buc2Temperature
buc2Temperature.description: Gets the BUC temperature. Format is x.x. **** No respond - message if buc2 not connected.

buc1MinMaxTemperature.name: buc1MinMaxTemperature
buc1MinMaxTemperature.description: Gets the BUC temperature. Format is x.x,y.y where x.x is max and y.y is min temperature. **** No respond - message if buc1 not connected.

buc2MinMaxTemperature.name: buc2MinMaxTemperature
buc2MinMaxTemperature.description: Gets the BUC temperature. Format is x.x,y.y where x.x is max and y.y is min temperature. **** No respond - message if buc2 not connected.

buc1SystemSetting.name: buc1SystemSetting
buc1SystemSetting.description: Gets the current system status. Format is Bit0 - PA state, Bit1 - RS232 Tx, Bit2 - FSK Tx, Bit3 - RS485 Tx Bit4 - Redundancy mode, Bit5 - Online, Bit6..Bit7 - Redundancy cold or hot mode, Bit8 - HTTP Tx, Bit9 - TELNET Tx, Bit10 - SNMP Tx. Respond -1 if buc1 not connected.

buc2SystemSetting.name: buc2SystemSetting
buc2SystemSetting.description: Gets the current system status. Format is Bit0 - PA state, Bit1 - RS232 Tx, Bit2 - FSK Tx, Bit3 - RS485 Tx Bit4 - Redundancy mode, Bit5 - Online, Bit6..Bit7 - Redundancy cold or hot mode, Bit8 - HTTP Tx, Bit9 - TELNET Tx, Bit10 - SNMP Tx. Respond -1 if buc2 not connected.

buc1SystemPoll.name: buc1SystemPoll
buc1SystemPoll.description: Gets the system poll status. Format is Bit0 - Fault, Bit1 - System change. Respond -1 if buc1 not connected.

buc2SystemPoll.name: buc2SystemPoll
buc2SystemPoll.description: Gets the system poll status. Format is Bit0 - Fault, Bit1 - System change. Respond -1 if buc2 not connected.

buc1DeviceType.name: buc1DeviceType
buc1DeviceType.description: Gets the device type. Format is X,Y where X is the model and Y is software version. **** No respond - message if buc1 not connected.

buc2DeviceType.name: buc2DeviceType
buc2DeviceType.description: Gets the device type. Format is X,Y where X is the model and Y is software version. **** No respond - message if buc2 not connected.

buc1Gateway.name: buc1Gateway
buc1Gateway.description: Gets the BUC gateway address (Only for RBUC). **** No respond - message if buc1 not connected.

buc2Gateway.name: buc2Gateway
buc2Gateway.description: Gets the BUC gateway address (Only for RBUC). **** No respond - message if buc2 not connected.

buc1IpAddress.name: buc1IpAddress
buc1IpAddress.description: Gets the BUC IP address (Only for RBUC). **** No respond - message if buc1 not connected.

buc2IpAddress.name: buc2IpAddress
buc2IpAddress.description: Gets the BUC IP address (Only for RBUC). **** No respond - message if buc2 not connected.

buc1MACAddress.name: buc1MACAddress
buc1MACAddress.description: Gets the BUC MAC address (Only for RBUC). **** No respond - message if buc1 not connected.

buc2MACAddress.name: buc2MACAddress
buc2MACAddress.description: Gets the BUC MAC address (Only for RBUC). **** No respond - message if buc2 not connected.

buc1Netmask.name: buc1Netmask
buc1Netmask.description: Gets the BUC netmask (Only for RBUC). **** No respond - message if buc1 not connected.

buc2Netmask.name: buc2Netmask
buc2Netmask.description: Gets the BUC netmask (Only for RBUC). **** No respond - message if buc2 not connected.

buc1RefPower.name: buc1RefPower
buc1RefPower.description: Gets the BUC reference power. **** No respond - message if buc1 not connected.

buc2RefPower.name: buc2RefPower
buc2RefPower.description: Gets the BUC reference power. **** No respond - message if buc2 not connected.

buc1Config.name: buc1Config
buc1Config.description: Gets the BUC configuration. **** No respond - message if buc1 not connected.

buc2Config.name: buc2Config
buc2Config.description: Gets the BUC configuration. **** No respond - message if buc2 not connected.

buc1BuildStandard.name: buc1BuildStandard
buc1BuildStandard.description: Gets the BUC build standard. **** No respond - message if buc1 not connected.

buc2BuildStandard.name: buc2BuildStandard
buc2BuildStandard.description: Gets the BUC build standard. **** No respond - message if buc2 not connected.

buc1IdInfo.name: buc1IdInfo
buc1IdInfo.description: Gets the module firmware revision, serial number and model. This string will have a zero length if the revision is unknown. **** No respond - message if buc1 not connected.

buc2IdInfo.name: buc2IdInfo
buc2IdInfo.description: Gets the module firmware revision, serial number and model. This string will have a zero length if the revision is unknown. **** No respond - message if buc2 not connected.

buc1Limits.name: buc1Limits
buc1Limits.description: Gets the limit data for the BUC. Format is: Power meter MIN/MAX , IF,RF and LO frequencies. This string will have a zero length if the revision is unknown. **** No respond - message if buc1 not connected.

buc2Limits.name: buc2Limits
buc2Limits.description: Gets the limit data for the BUC. Format is: Power meter MIN/MAX , IF,RF and LO frequencies. This string will have a zero length if the revision is unknown. **** No respond - message if buc2 not connected.

buc1PktProtocolsInfo.name: buc1PktProtocolsInfo
buc1PktProtocolsInfo.description: Gets supported packet protocols and the corresponding address ranges. **** No respond - message if buc1 not connected.

buc2PktProtocolsInfo.name: buc2PktProtocolsInfo
buc2PktProtocolsInfo.description: Gets supported packet protocols and the corresponding address ranges. **** No respond - message if buc2 not connected.
